dc:title: Three Who Have Died
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Three obituaries--Thelma, a drug addict she met in jail, and of two Catholic Workers, Betty and Jim. Recounts how she held out a hopeful vision of God's love to Thelma before she died of an overdose. Remembers rubbing Betty's back as she lay dying in the hospital.
